nodes.title: Physics Prebiotic Chemistry Tree
nodes.excerpt: Dedicated lane for prebiotic chemistry constraints that bridge physics roots to biogenesis claims.
nodes.bodyMD: This lane captures molecular selection, reaction network constraints, and deterministic linkage toward life-emergence pathways.
nodes.summary: Dedicated lane for prebiotic chemistry constraints that bridge physics roots to biogenesis claims.

nodes.title: Chemical Selection
nodes.excerpt: Molecular selection assumptions used by prebiotic-path falsifiers.
nodes.bodyMD: Defines deterministic criteria for molecular pathway selection under constrained environments.
nodes.summary: Molecular selection assumptions used by prebiotic-path falsifiers.

nodes.title: Reaction Network Constraints
nodes.excerpt: Constraint contracts for prebiotic reaction networks and transition coverage.
nodes.bodyMD: Links reaction-path completeness to observable transition-coverage thresholds.
nodes.summary: Constraint contracts for prebiotic reaction networks and transition coverage.

nodes.title: Physics Prebiotic Chemistry Equation Residual
nodes.excerpt: Derived residual contract for lane equations with explicit tolerance and uncertainty declarations.
nodes.bodyMD: Defines the derived residual schema used to evaluate lane-level equation mismatch under declared uncertainty assumptions.
nodes.summary: Derived residual contract for lane equations with explicit tolerance and uncertainty declarations.
